note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Milling machines not designed for particular work or special operations

CPC-specific-text.text: with a tool moving in a closed path around the workpiece
movable milling machines, e.g. on rails

title-part.text: with working-spindle movable in a fixed position
with working-spindle movable in a vertical direction
with a plurality of horizontal working-spindles
with a plurality of vertical working-spindles
with both horizontal and vertical working-spindles
with spindle adjustable to different angles, e.g. either horizontal or vertical

title-part.text: specially designed for control by copying devices
for milling while revolving the work

CPC-specific-text.text: Milling end surfaces of nuts or tubes

CPC-specific-text.text: having means for guiding the tool carrying spindle

title-part.text: Milling cams, camshafts, or the like
Trimming or finishing edges, e.g. deburring welded corners

Trimming or finishing edges of doors and windows

title-part.text: Surface milling of plates, sheets or strips
Scrubbing or peeling ingots or similar workpieces
Working surfaces curved in two directions
for shaping screw-propellers, turbine blades, or impellers
Forming overlapped joints, e.g. of the ends of piston-rings
Making square or polygonal ends on workpieces, e.g. key studs on tools
Making square or polygonal holes in workpieces, e.g. key holes in tools

CPC-specific-text.text: in which more than one milling tool is used simultaneously, e.g. for sheet material

title-part.text: Milling helical grooves, e.g. in making twist-drills
Milling grooves of other forms, e.g. circumferential

CPC-specific-text.text: Details of the milling cutter body

title-part.text: characterised by the shape of the cutter
Plain cutters, i.e. having essentially a cylindrical or tapered cutting surface of substantial length
Face-milling cutters, i.e. having only or primarily a substantially flat cutting surface
Shank-type cutters, i.e. with an integral shaft

CPC-specific-text.text: with one or more removable cutting inserts
having a single cutting insert, the cutting edges of which subtend 180 degrees
having a cutting insert, the cutting edge of which subtends substantially 90 degrees

title-part.text: Cutters specially designed for producing particular profiles
characterised by physical features other than shape

title-part.text: Lands, i.e. the outer peripheral section of rake faces
Mounted tangentially, i.e. where the rake face is not the face with largest area
Connections between the shanks and detachable cutting heads
Cutting heads comprised of different material than the shank irrespective of whether the head is detachable from the shank
Side or top views of the cutting edge
Details of the corner region between axial and radial cutting edges
Cutting edges with a wave form
Cross section of the cutting edge
Fixation of inserts or cutting bits in the tool
Seats for cutting inserts, supports for replacable cutting bits
Overall form of the milling cutter

reference.text: angles B23C2210/04; top or side views of cutting edges B23C2210/08; cross sections of cutting edges B23C2210/12

title-part.text: Cross sections of the whole milling cutter
Form tools, i.e. cutting edges profiles to generate a particular form
Milling cutters comprised of disc-shaped modules or multiple disc-like cutters
Milling cutters comprising a disc having a wave form
Milling cutters comprising a hole or hollow in the end face or between the cutting edges
Unequal angles between the cutting edges, i.e. cutting edges unequally spaced in the circumferential direction
Cutting edges arranged at different diameters
Cutting edges arranged at different axial positions or having different lengths in the axial direction
Lands, i.e. the area on the rake face in the immediate vicinity of the cutting edge
Separate teeth, i.e. discrete profiled teeth similar to those of a hob
Different teeth, i.e. one tooth having a different configuration to a tooth on the opposite side of the flute
File like cutting teeth, e.g. the teeth of cutting burrs
having decreasing depth in the direction of the shank from the tip of the tool
having increasing depth in the direction of the shank from the tip of the tool
Margins, i.e. the part of the peripheral suface immediately adacent the cutting edge
mounted so as to be able to rotate freely
Supporting or guiding sections located on the periphery of the tool
Axis of the cutter inclined with respect to the axis of rotation
End milling cutters having a groove in the end cutting face, the groove not being present so as to provide a cutting edge
Markings, i.e. symbols or indicating marks
Reground to nominal diameter by removal of material from both the front of the insert and the back of insert carrier

reference.text: B23C2215/16, B23C2215/20 and B23C2215/24 take precedence

title-part.text: Valve guides in combination with the neighbouring valve seat
Well pipe windows, i.e. windows in tubings or casings for wells
Milling with the axis of the cutter inclined to the surface being machined
Milling with the axis of the tool perpendicular to the workpiece axis
Cutting off, i.e. producing multiple discrete components from a single piece of material
Methods of milling not otherwise provided for
Orbital drilling, i.e. use of a milling cutter moved in a spiral path to produce a hole
Using an endmill, i.e. a shaft milling cutter, to generate profile of a crankshaft or camshaft
Materials of tools or workpieces composed of metals, alloys or metal matrices
Details of hard metal, i.e. cemented carbide
Metal matrices with metallic or non-metallic particles or fibres

Plastics not otherwise provided for, e.g. nylon

title-part.text: Properties of materials of tools or workpieces, materials of tools or workpieces applied in a specific manner
Cast, i.e. in the form of a casting

title-part.text: to the middle of the cutter or in the middle of a hollow cutter

Templates for the simulation of keys
Details of connections of tools or workpieces
